rows.label: tlk70000122_05_msg0001
rows.name:
So you're headed for the Iiran core?
You'll want some advice from a pro
adventu... OK, look, here's my advice.

rows.label: tlk70000122_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Leave the capital and go to Lake Wynn
through Dannagh Desert. You'll find a
narrow path through the woods there.

rows.label: tlk70000122_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Follow the path and make for the series
of stone pillars lining a large stairway.

rows.label: tlk70000122_05_msg0004
rows.name:
There'll be a gate to the core there, but
it's been sealed for some time now, so
who knows what's contained within.

rows.label: tlk70000122_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Gah... I've been playing the big hero
and trying to act like Prince Adel,
but I'll admit that's not me...

rows.label: tlk70000122_05_msg0006
rows.name:
But you... I believe you'll be able to
save Iira because you truly are
heroes... Please protect this country!
